entry.title: SPECIAL WEATHER STATEMENT , Medicine Hat
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 9:11 PM MST Saturday 24 December 2022

entry.title: Current Conditions: Cloudy, -0.3°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Medicine Hat Airport 11:24 PM MST Saturday 24 December 2022
Condition: Cloudy
Temperature: -0.3°C
Pressure: 100.8 kPa
Visibility: 16.1 km
Humidity: 84 %
Wind Chill: -7
Dewpoint: -2.7°C
Wind: SW 35 km/h gust 48 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: 2

entry.title: Saturday night: Chance of rain showers or flurries. Temperature rising to plus 3 by morning. POP 60%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. 60 percent chance of rain showers or flurries changing to 60 percent chance of flurries before morning. Risk of freezing rain this evening. Local blowing snow before morning. Wind southeast 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming southwest 40 gusting to 70 early this evening then northwest 50 gusting to 80 near midnight. Temperature rising to plus 3 by morning. Wind chill minus 15 this evening. Forecast issued 4:00 PM MST Saturday 24 December 2022

entry.title: Sunday: Chance of flurries. Temperature falling to minus 11 in the afternoon. POP 60%
entry.summary: Cloudy with 60 percent chance of flurries early in the morning then a mix of sun and cloud. Local blowing snow early in the morning. Wind northwest 40 km/h gusting to 70 becoming light in the morning. Temperature falling to minus 11 in the afternoon. Wind chill minus 9 in the morning and minus 18 in the afternoon. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 4:00 PM MST Saturday 24 December 2022

entry.title: Sunday night: A few clouds. Low minus 14.
entry.summary: A few clouds. Increasing cloudiness before morning. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 14. Wind chill minus 20 in the evening. Forecast issued 4:00 PM MST Saturday 24 December 2022
